headline: Investing $50,000 in This Ultra-High-Yield Dividend Stock Could Generate $2,865 in Annual Passive Income
summary: Realty Income is a leading REIT with a diversified and large tenant base.  The company is a passive income machine that has increased its dividend for 30 consecutive years.  Realty Income also has solid growth prospects.
